name: Divshot, Inc.
description: Provider of a browser-based, front-end development platform for responsive web applications. The company has developed a web application interface for designing webpages and exporting them to HTML5/CSS3.
one_liner: Provider of a browser-based, front-end development platform for responsive web applications. The company has developed a web application interface for designing webpages and exporting them to HTML5/CSS3.
